data.name: Learn Japanese To Survive! Katakana War - Study Guide
data.detailed_description:
This DLC pack contains a PDF file. You get the Katakana Handbook, a useful study guide that acts as a companion to the Katakana War game.

Katakana is one of the basic writing systems used in Japanese. Japanese actually combines 3 different sets of characters to form written works: Hiragana, Katakana and Kanji. This book focuses solely on Katakana, which is often used to write words of foreign origin, as well as the names of people and places.

- 32 pages, presented in a PDF file.

[LOCATING YOUR DLC ONCE PURCHASED & DOWNLOADED]

This PDF file is downloaded to your game's Steam directory after purchase. The default location is:

\Program Files (x86)\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\Learn Japanese To Survive! Katakana War\

If this is not valid on your PC, locate your game's install directory using these instructions:

- Open the Steam client and navigate to your game library
- Right-click the entry for Learn Japanese To Survive! Katakana War and select Properties
- Click the Local Files tab
- Click Browse Local Files

This will open the game's directory, and once your DLC is installed, you'll be able to view the PDF file.

fullgame.name: Learn Japanese To Survive! Katakana War

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF viewer, such as Adobe Acrobat

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.10 or better
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Compatible OpenGLR
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: PDF viewer, such as Adobe Acrobat
